title: Strengthening Organizational Learning Capabilities Through Service Learning: Application in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic language instruction and understanding of organizational learning theories
context.additional_context: Learners engage in language-based service projects to solve community issues, with flexible learning activities facilitated through mobile platforms

learning_goals: Learners can improve intercultural communication skills by 30% through service-learning projects
Learners can design role distribution and collaboration processes within organizations with 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate self-directed learning abilities through reflective journaling and team feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
